content.raw:
It was initially reported on the [osrf/simulation homebrew tap](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/issues/29), and I have confirmed on my mac that protobuf 2.6.0 causes compilation errors in gazebo.

One issue is a symbol collision for `TYPE_BOOL`. There may be multiple variants of this issue, here's [one from 2009](http://code.google.com/p/protobuf/issues/detail?id=119). Also, we have an `#undef TYPE_BOOL` in [ModelListWidget.cc](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/4b0732be863890410ca5dbf27c3373c79939fa83/gazebo/gui/ModelListWidget.cc?at=default#cl-55), which looks similar, though I don't know what changed in protobuf 2.6.0 to break this.
content.html:
It was initially reported on the osrf/simulation homebrew tap, and I have confirmed on my mac that protobuf 2.6.0 causes compilation errors in gazebo.

One issue is a symbol collision for TYPE_BOOL. There may be multiple variants of this issue, here's one from 2009. Also, we have an #undef TYPE_BOOL in ModelListWidget.cc, which looks similar, though I don't know what changed in protobuf 2.6.0 to break this.
